FulfillmentOrderItemAdjustment.name: FulfillmentOrderItemAdjustment
FulfillmentOrderItemAdjustment.description: Represents a price adjustment on a FulfillmentOrderLineItem. Corresponds to an OrderItemAdjustmentLineSummary associated with the corresponding OrderItemSummary.

Amount.description: Amount, not including tax, of the adjustment.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: ISO code for the currency of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem to which the adjustment applies. The default value is USD.

FulfillmentOrderId.description: ID of the FulfillmentOrder associated with the FulfillmentOrderLineItem to which the adjustment applies.

FulfillmentOrder​LineItemId.description: ID of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem to which this adjustment applies.

OrderItemAdjust​LineSummaryId.description: ID of the OrderItemAdjustmentLineSummary associated with the adjustment.

TotalAmtWithTax.description: Total amount of the adjustment, inclusive of tax. This amount is equal to Amount + TotalTaxAmount.
